description: GoFlex™ TV HD media player offers the easiest way to play your movies, photos         and music on your TV. Insert a GoFlex ultra-portable drive or attach any other USB         storage device to enjoy your digital media in full 1080p video and surround sound         audio. By connecting the GoFlex TV HD media player to your router, you can access         shared media within your home network and Internet content such as Netflix®         and YouTube® on your TV. With its compact size, additional USB ports, Ethernet         connectivity, and extensive media format support, you can play just about everything         from the comfort of your living room.
title: Seagate FreeAgent GoFlex TV STAJ100
